description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Experience Mithra series now with awards, unlockables and more.  Join Tag in a mysterious adventure set in the bizarre world of planet G! Mithra is an action-adventure game full of fun puzzles to solve, new places to explore, interesting story to uncover, and lots of characters to meet.   For walkthrough and more information about the game go to www.afictiongames.com .
